author: The Canadian Press
title: Service Canada offices to shutter for in-person services over COVID-19 concerns
description: The federal government is shutting down the network of in-person Service Canada centres over COVID-19 concerns. Some of the offices have already started to close as confirmed cases of COVID-19 have increased and workers were needed elsewhere, or felt uncomfor…
content:
The federal government is shutting down the network of in-person Service Canada centres over COVID-19 concerns.
Some of the offices, such as one tucked inside Ottawa's city hall, have already started to close as confirmed cases of COVID-19 have increased and… [+2813 chars]
